description: Top level view for Validator nodes + Faucet server

panels.description: Rate of submit_transaction requests accepted by AdmissionControl, per-instance view.
panels.title: AC SubmitTransaction Request Rate

panels.description: Rate of block commits by consensus, including empty blocks.
panels.title: Committed blocks per sec

panels.description: Rate of transactions commits: can be zero if there are no new transactions.
panels.title: Committed txns per sec

panels.description: Average time it takes for a transaction to commit since it's received by Mempool.
panels.title: E2E Latency

panels.description: Among all the transactions of the committed blocks, calculates the percentage of the transactions that failed the execution.
panels.title: Failed txns rate

panels.description: Count the number of active transactions that timeout in mempool
panels.title: Timeout txns per sec

title: Overview
